privacy.title: Privacy & Cookies
privacy.description: DarkMonkey privacy policy and cookie usage.
privacy.cookiesIntro: DarkMonkey uses cookies to provide essential functionality and improve your experience. By using our site, you consent to the use of these cookies.
privacy.cartCookieDesc: Stores your shopping cart so items persist across sessions (7 days).
privacy.authCookiesDesc: Used when you sign in to keep you logged in securely.
privacy.consentCookieDesc: Remembers that you accepted our cookie policy.
privacy.dataIntro: When you place an order, we collect your name, email, shipping address, and payment information (processed securely via Stripe). We use this solely to fulfill your order and communicate with you about it.
privacy.rightsIntro: You may request access to, correction of, or deletion of your personal data. Contact us for any privacy-related inquiries.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Contact DarkMonkey support and customer service.
contact.intro: For orders, returns, or general questions, reach us by email. We aim to respond within 24–48 hours on business days.
contact.refundsIntro: For refunds and returns, please include your order number. For account or technical issues, describe your request and we will assist you.

terms.title: Terms of service
terms.description: DarkMonkey terms of service and use.
terms.acceptanceIntro: By using the DarkMonkey store, you agree to these terms of service. If you do not agree, please do not use our site or services.
terms.useOfStoreIntro: You may use our store for lawful purposes only. You may not misuse the site, attempt to gain unauthorized access, or use it in any way that could harm the service or other users.
terms.ordersPaymentIntro: Orders are subject to availability. We reserve the right to refuse or cancel orders. By placing an order, you agree to pay the stated price and applicable taxes and shipping.

shipping.title: Shipping policy
shipping.deliveryRegionsIntro: We ship to addresses in Europe and North America. Shipping costs and delivery times vary by country and are shown at checkout.
shipping.processingTimeIntro: Orders are processed within 2–5 business days. You will receive a confirmation email with tracking information once your order has shipped.
shipping.deliveryTimesIntro: Standard delivery typically takes 5–10 business days within Europe and 7–14 business days to North America. Express options may be available at checkout.

refund.title: Refund policy
refund.returnsIntro: You may return unused items in their original condition within 30 days of delivery for a full refund. Items must be unworn, unwashed, and with original tags. Contact us to request a return label and instructions.
refund.refundsProcessed: Refunds are processed within 5–10 business days after we receive the return. The amount will be credited to your original payment method.
refund.exclusionsIntro: Custom or personalized items, and items marked as final sale, are not eligible for return unless defective.

legal.title: Legal Notice (Impressum)
legal.description: DarkMonkey legal notice, company information, and contact details as required by Swiss law.
legal.uidValue: Not required (sole proprietorship below VAT threshold)
legal.disputeIntro: We are not obliged and not willing to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board. Consumers in the EU may use the European Commission's Online Dispute Resolution platform at https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr. In Switzerland, the cantonal conciliation authority has jurisdiction.
legal.disclaimerIntro: We strive to keep the information on this site accurate and up to date. We do not warrant that the site is error-free or uninterrupted. Use of the site is at your own risk. External links are provided for convenience; we are not responsible for the content of linked sites.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about shipping, returns, and our products.
faq.shippingA1: We ship primarily to Europe and North America. Shipping costs and delivery times are calculated at checkout based on your location.
faq.shippingA2: Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days in Europe and 7-14 days for North America. Express options may be available.
faq.returnsA1: You can return unused items in their original condition within 30 days. Custom items are non-refundable unless defective.
faq.paymentQ1: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.paymentA1: We accept major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), Apple Pay, and Google Pay.
faq.productsA1: Customization is available on select premium items. Look for the 'Customizable' option on the product page.
